properties.name: Another Moon
properties.description: Posted by Million  729 E Burnside St #105, Portland, ORAnother Moon is a unique shop in Portland, Oregon, offering an eclectic selection of locally handcrafted items, classes, and community events. Wicca, Spiritual, Esoteric, Mystical store.

properties.name: Banana Bungalow
properties.description: Posted by Million 707 reed ave, san diego, ca 92109The only hostel in San Diego located on the beach.

properties.name: Che Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Million     ucsd, La JollaCommunity space, vegetarian cafe, all ages venue and uncompromising radical politics since 1980. Located on the UCSD campus with no actual street address. Its a little mainstay co-op volunteer run everything space that has been providing San Diegans with a safe place to go for 25 years.

properties.name: Common Ground Wellness Center
properties.description: Posted by Million   2927 ne everett, portland oregonCommon Ground is an urban oasis dedicated to providing a nurturing, healing environment ... A place for self-care on your path to well-being. Outdoor garden hot tubs and cedar saunas. Co-ed (with certain nights reserved for woman only or men only). Hours vary.

properties.name: Common Grounds
properties.description: Posted by Million 2926 ne flanders, portland, orCommon Ground is an urban oasis dedicated to providing a nurturing, healing environment ... A place for self-care on your path to well-being. Outdoor garden hot tubs and cedar saunas. Co-ed (with certain nights reserved for woman only or men only). Hours vary.

properties.name: Happy New Year!
properties.description: Posted by Million  2005 is coming to a close and people from around the world are converging and celebrating life with hope for the coming year (optimistically such a thought). A radiation of energy that if well directed, could drastically alter the course we are headed in.

properties.name: Moonshadow
properties.description: Posted by Million3352 Se Hawthorne Blvd, Portland, OR Moonshadow has been serving the Portland pagan community since August 1995. Debora and Roy take great pride and joy in providing affordable "tools of the trade" to meet all the every day needs of local practitioners. They specialize in Wiccan, Druidic and Egyptian themes with a smattering of Asatru, Thelemic, OTO and a few other paths.

properties.name: Paige's beautiful art installation
properties.description: Posted by Million 32 nw 5th ave, portland, orIts at Portland Art Center... another art installation by Paige which she of course doesnt tell anyone when she has one and also of course, its incrediblely beautiful work from an incredibly talented, beautiful, inspiring, and insane woman. I think "I" adjectives are in order today...

properties.name: The Little Fawn
properties.description: Posted by Million Wonderful magic place where for the past 6 years has been a recording studio and rehearsal place for rock bands. There is ghosts inside and it is across the street from the graveyard. The Little Fawn is about to end.

properties.name: The Yoga Space
properties.description: Posted by Million   2536 se ankeny, portland orLarge amount of yoga, meditation, and movement classes. Fun, informal studio where you pay each instructor directly (and some of the most inexpensive classes around town). Highly recommended.

properties.name: Tulen Center
properties.description: Posted by Million 8641 n lombard, portland, orMartial arts and fitness center. 3 locations around Portland. Offer Kickboxing, Poekoelan, Cun tao, Yoga, Meditation, etc. Very kid friendly.

properties.name: USA hostels- San Diego
properties.description: Posted by Million 726 5th Avenue, san diego, ca 92101Hostel in downtown San Diego in the historic gaslamp quarter.

properties.name: driving thru the desert at night
properties.description: Posted by Million  Everytime i go throught the sw desert i remmber how i am infinitly connected to that dimension of weirdness. I love the mysteriousness of the desert... so desolate yet so incredibly teeming with life. Esp at night. Can be tough for the untough... can be hell for the unready. But \'tis a bit o\' heaven for me. Well, at least it is in spring and autumn. I have such incredible memories of driving E to W on the 10... sunset in its goldenmost lusciousness dipping down, roosting for the night to take over... then hours later still driving, still on the 10 with everyone asleep and me on coffee or epedrine all geeked out listening to Coast To Coast.... the brightness of the luminescence of the moon casting silver shimmer all around... like living in mercury... so beautiful makes me want to live in moonlight forever... then the sun rising and the cacti peeking awake like little old mexican men.. but like little babies in the freshness of a new dawn... and i pull over for someone to take the wheel and i try to sleep but am too excited as we pull into Tombstone and i buy a big hat and skulls and a pipe made out of a bone.

properties.name: stuff on my cat
properties.description: Posted by Milliongotta see it to enjoy it
